title: Ripple AI - Social Welfare Microservices Platform
description: I developed Ripple AI as a social media platform dedicated to social welfare. The project focuses on handling real-time social engagement and impact tracking at scale. By using a microservices architecture with Eureka and an API Gateway, I ensured the platform could scale modularly while providing advanced features like post analytics and a reward system for users contributing to social causes.
features: Microservices architecture with Eureka service discovery and API Gateway
Real-time feed updates via WebSockets and Kafka event workflows
Redis caching for low-latency data retrieval
Lightweight AI-powered post analytics and notification service
Subscription billing and a ranking-rewards system
useCases: Social welfare networking and community engagement
Real-time social impact tracking and rewards
Scalable architecture for high-traffic social applications
